/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in hues of white and beige, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. Their red roofs add a pop of color to the otherwise neutral palette. The street itself is flanked by lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Cars parked along the side of the road add a touch of modernity to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of nature and architecture, a characteristic feature of Beijing's urban landscape.
